dcterms:creator: Yamada, Ikuya
Shindo, Hiroyuki
Takeda, Hideaki
Takefuji, Yoshiyasu
dcterms:description: Wikipedia2Vec is a dataset that embeds words and entities (Wikipedia URLs) into a common vector space. It is trained using a combination of skipgram Word2Vec, a graph loss based on Wikipedia hyperlink structure, and a version of Word2Vec where words are predicted from entities.
dcterms:title: Wikipedia2Vec

dcterms:creator: Petroni, Fabio
Rocktäschel, Tim
Lewis, Patrick
Bakhtin, Anton
Wu, Yuxiang
Miller, Alexander H.
Riedel, Sebastian
dcterms:description: LAMA (LAnguage Model Analysis) is a benchmark dataset for evaluating the factual and commonsense knowledge of pretrained language models. It consists of two subsets: LAMA-Google-RE and LAMA-T-REx, which are aimed at factual knowledge.
dcterms:title: LAMA

dcterms:creator: Zhang, Zhilin
Han, Xu
Liu, Zhiyuan
Jiang, Xin
Sun, Maosong
Liu, Qun
dcterms:description: FewRel is a dataset for few-shot relation classification. It contains sentences with annotated subject and object entity mentions, their oracle entity IDs, and their relation, which must be predicted.
dcterms:title: FewRel

dcterms:creator: Hoffart, Johannes
Yosef, Mohamed Amir
Bordino, Ilaria
Fäurstauenau, Hagen
Pinkal, Manfred
Spaniol, Marc
Taneva, Bilyana
Thater, Stefan
Weikum, Gerhard
dcterms:description: AIDA is a dataset for entity linking in news text. It contains documents with annotated entity spans, which must be predicted and linked to the correct Wikipedia URLs.
dcterms:title: AIDA
